question: Which factors are included in the the APPEND score?
ideal_answer: APPEND score components are anorexia, migratory Pain, local Peritonism, Elevated C-reactive protein, Neutrophilia and male gender (Dude). It is an acute appendicitis clinical prediction rule.

snippets.text: Derivation and validation of the APPEND score: an acute appendicitis clinical prediction rule.
RESULTS: The final components of the new CPR, the APPEND score, were Anorexia, migratory Pain, local Peritonism, Elevated C-reactive protein, Neutrophilia and male gender (Dude).

RESULTS

exact_answer: anorexia, migratory Pain, local Peritonism, Elevated C-reactive protein, Neutrophilia, male gender
